title: Ticket #5800: condor_q -run does not output summary line when set config to do so
description:
When set Q_DEFAULT_RUN_PRINT_FORMAT=<file> in condor_config to a format file that should output a summary line, condor_q does not.

Example of <file>:

q_totals.cpf outputs nothing while it should print a single summary line 

SELECT NOHEADER NOTITLE
SUMMARY STANDARD

The behavior also applies to other condor_q commands without a summary line, such as -grid, -goodput, -globus...
creator: shuyang
